revised_title: Molluscan and Plant Biostratigraphy in Late Devensian and Flandrian Deposits of Kent
tldr: This study examines mollusk and plant fossils in Late Devensian and Flandrian deposits in Kent, providing a detailed reconstruction of local environments and revealing a common pattern of faunal changes influenced by climate and migration. The research proposes eight biostratigraphical assemblage zones applicable to similar deposits in southern England, correlating with standard Godwin pollen zones of the Late Devensian and Flandrian periods.
